text: Stand Up and Scream was the debut album of the English metalcore band Asking Alexandria. It was released on 15 September 2009 through Sumerian Records. The album came number 170 on the Billboard 200, number 29 on Top Independent albums and number 5 on Heatseekers. ==Track listing== ==Band Members== *Danny Worsnop - lead vocals, keyboards, piano, synthesizers, programming *Ben Bruce - lead guitar, backing vocals, vocals on track 8 and 9, programming *Cameron Liddell - rhythm guitar *Sam Bettley - bass guitar *James Cassells - drums ==References== Category:Heavy metal albums Category:2009 albums
title: Stand Up and Scream
